name: Ferdinand "Ferd" Cami
title: Vice President, Global Legal Hosted Services
summary: Strategic and collaborative technology executive with deep expertise in eDiscovery, legal technology, and global hosted solutions. Proven record of scaling professional services organizations in hypergrowth environments by orchestrating cross-functional teams, optimizing operational efficiency, and driving measurable customer outcomes. Known as a customer-obsessed, low-ego leader who simplifies complexity, inspires distributed teams, and builds value-driven service models. Adept at fintech, analytics/AI, and legal technology, with a consistent track record of improving execution speed, client satisfaction, and operational scalability.

experience.role: Vice President, Global Legal Hosted Services
highlights: Directed department, overseeing an average of 58,000+ annual hours (42,000 billable / 16,000 non-billable) and driving $5M+ in annual professional services revenue with annualized contributions up to $6.7M
Improved utilization and efficiency, achieving ~81% utilization and 75% target attainment while balancing client delivery with operational and talent development priorities
Oversaw more than 2 petabytes of active eDiscovery hosting data, generating $220M in ARR, creating a recurring, high-margin revenue stream
Directed global teams across multiple regions, instilling a culture of accountability, customer empathy, and operational excellence
Defined and tracked KPIs for uptime, efficiency, and client satisfaction, reducing delivery friction and improving implementation cycle times
Led strategic collaborations with product, commercial, and engineering teams to integrate client needs into scalable solutions and long-term product roadmaps
Mentored and developed talent, creating a distributed high-performing team through structured training, coaching, and leadership development
Introduced scalable solutions for data migration, system performance, and complex data transformations (SQL, multi-source extractions), resulting in measurable efficiency gains
Acted as executive sponsor for key clients, translating business goals into aligned technical outcomes and strengthening long-term partnerships
Built and managed professional services delivery frameworks for hosted and forensic solutions
Partnered with clients on complex implementations, ensuring security, compliance, and efficient execution
Elevated operational practices by implementing structured escalation protocols, reducing client impact of recurring technical issues
Managed large-scale eDiscovery projects across commercial litigation, employment law, and regulatory matters
Coordinated multidisciplinary teams and external vendors, ensuring on-time and budget-conscious delivery
Developed and refined project playbooks that improved delivery quality and reduced turnaround times
